sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has released a payload of consequences onto the Walt Disney Company for its decision to fight policies designed to protect children from sexual content in their earliest years of education.
author: Mark Davis
title: Pushback Against DeSantis Proves the Value of His Battle With Disney | Opinion
